string.text: I've been entrusted to enter Lab X-18 located under the Monolith base at Dark Valley to search for any documents down there. I don't know what to expect from it... but it surely won't be a walk in the park.

Veles sent me to Lab X-18 under the Monolith base at Dark Valley to find some PC and download information regarding those experiments the eggheads used to perform there. Why does he even think it's in there? Besides, I don't feel too good about the local power supply...
The code opening the underground research lab under Dark Valley is 5271.
If someone is reading this, this means I'm dead. The code to my PC is 9231. Please use any information you can find on it to help eradicate the mutations surge!
